TopicTitle: Stock Fighter Jet w/ working canopy & ejection seat

Articles.Content:
Hello everyone,

Here is fun 100% stock fighter jet I made!

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Features

- "real" cockpit: Kerbal actually climbs in, no "press 'f' to board"

- working canopy: opens and closes using landing legs. secured with klaw

- ejection seat: when the fit hits the shan, press 'abort' to pop the canopy and eject you Kerbal to safety (parachute included)

- 3 harpoints under each wing and missile rails on the wingtips: standard version comes with 2 drop tanks (more than quadruples the flight time), 2 guided missiles, 4 unguided bombs (two per hard point), and 2 unguided rockets)

-large rover wheels: give rear landing gear scale appearance and motorized taxiing ability

Part count: 308 clean

Part count: 422 w/ standard payload configuration (bombs, missiles, drop tanks, rockets)

The main goal was to build an aircraft with a working ejection seat, just as a proof of concept. However, the jet ended up looking really good, and flying really well too. Not to mention all the other cool features. So I thought I'd share it with y'all. This jet isn't really based off of any specific real-world design. I just kind of threw it together, and it turned out really well. It flies beautifully, and has no problem getting into the air, even when fully loaded.

Hope you enjoy, and let me know what you think!

GATOR

Download HERE
